Articles.Content:
How do I either 1. Add or equip multiple ignitions to and engine or 2. Disable limited ignitions.

 

Thank You

For 1, pick an engine with multiple ignitions. For 2, open your RealSettings.cfg and change this line from true to false.

https://github.com/NathanKell/ModularFuelSystem/blob/master/RealFuels/RealSettings.cfg#L725
